content:
on option similar to the OBR-11 status code "G-Generated order, reflex order" add

a "generated" flag extension to DiagnosticReport.result.

name: generated

context: DiagnosticReport.result.

type boolean

card: 0..1

defintion: Indicater if observation is generated as result of a reflex test order.

requirement: To differentiate the reflex results from the parent test results

However need to review the workflow pages first to see how is covered there.
Is this to address the genomics usecase or is this for something else? (It wouldn't meet the genomics requirement.)
